mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID ID ,USER_NAME NAME ,DEPT_CODE OUCODE ,DEPT_NAME OU ,DEPT_FNAME ORGFULLNAME ,MAIL ,USER_ID SID ,USER_PASSWORD PASSWD ,(SELECT U.FILE_PATH ||'/'|| U.FILE_NAME FROM PSN_USER_POTO_INFO U WHERE A.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND A.SLCT_POTO_SEQ = U.POTO_SEQ ) USER_REP_IMG ,USER_NICK NICKNAME FROM PSN_USER_INFO A WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT USER_ID ID ,USER_NAME NAME ,DEPT_CODE OUCODE ,DEPT_NAME OU ,DEPT_FNAME ORGFULLNAME ,MAIL ,USER_ID SID ,USER_PASSWORD PASSWD ,(SELECT U.FILE_PATH ||'/'|| U.FILE_NAME FROM PSN_USER_POTO_INFO U WHERE A.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND A.SLCT_POTO_SEQ = U.POTO_SEQ ) USER_REP_IMG ,USER_NICK NICKNAME ,NVL(TMLN_READ_DTTM, SYSDATE) TMLN_READ_DTTM FROM PSN_USER_INFO A WHERE RESINUMBER = #{ssnId}
